availability.message: Open to freelance and co-op opportunities or just to chat

posts.title: My New Now Page!
posts.body: It's a new year, a new semester. With that, lots of other people have Now pages on their sites so now is as good a time as any to put one together myself as well as a bit of a design overhaul! Anyways, as I keep updating this I hope that you'll enjoy it and get to know me a little better.
